definition: a row/a line/to set in order/to arrange/to line up/to eliminate/to drain/to push open/platoon/raft/classifier for lines, rows etc
name/noun (part of speech)/place (e.g. among winners)/famous/classifier for people
ranking/ordered list/top 20/roll of honor/to come nth out of 100

sentences.english: Managers may disown their part in the appraisal system.
sentences.chinese: 管理者也許會否認在業績排名系統裏面的角色。

sentences.english: <div class="cfx">The list also reflected breakneck advances in supercomputing speeds.
sentences.chinese: 這份排名還反映了在超級計算速度方面的極快進步。

sentences.english: You can go from pick one to 30 and find a Hall of Famer.
sentences.chinese: 從排名第一到30，都有可能是未來的名人堂成員。

sentences.english: And universities try to make themselves bigger andstronger to get a better ranking.
sentences.chinese: 學校也試圖使自己變得更大更強來獲得更好的排名。

sentences.english: The top city in Asia is Singapore, at no. 26.
sentences.chinese: 新加坡作爲亞洲最佳城市，排名26。

sentences.english: How would you rank the brand perception of massage chair?
sentences.chinese: 你將如何排名對按摩椅品牌的觀感？

sentences.english: The top four seedings are the same as the current world rankings.
sentences.chinese: 前四名的種子選手跟目前世界排名一樣。

sentences.english: Then the second-place man sliced a fly into quarters.
sentences.chinese: 緊接着排名第二的人將一隻蒼蠅切成了四半。

sentences.english: Already the youngest university in the world’s top 100, HKUST’s feat will give heart to other relatively recent foundations around the world.
sentences.chinese: 它的排名鼓舞了世界上其他相對年輕的大學。

sentences.english: The bank must be on top of 25 world bank.
sentences.chinese: 出證銀行排名須爲世界前25位內。

sentences.english: Avon Lake, Ohio school Address Telephone Fax arrangement.
sentences.chinese: 埃文湖，俄亥俄學校排名電話傳真網址。

sentences.english: The ranking results of Taiwanese universities could also have been adversely affected by the following.
sentences.chinese: 臺灣的大學排名落後，原因有如下數端。

sentences.english: Laze on the white-sand beach or golf on two world-ranked courses.
sentences.chinese: 在白沙灘或高爾夫球拉則在兩個世界排名課程。

sentences.english: Read the novel global network traffic rank highest 171.
sentences.chinese: 小說閱讀網全球流量排名歷史最高171名。

sentences.english: Today is day 3 of The Heist‘s reign, and sales are quickening.
sentences.chinese: 今天是海斯特主導排名的第三天，銷售還在加快。

sentences.english: Department heads review the reviews, re-grade and re-rank.
sentences.chinese: 部門負責人會審查評估結果，重新打分和排名。

definition: ranking/ordered list/top 20/roll of honor/to come nth out of 100
position in a ranking of names/place/rank
to stand above/to occupy an important position/to rank (among the top few)
to rank (number 1, or third last etc)/to be among (those who are in a particular group)
notice or announcement/list of names/public roll of successful examinees
